Uses of Interface
org.cojen.tupl.EventListener

Packages that use EventListener
Package Description
org.cojen.tupl
See Database to get started with Tupl.

  • Uses of EventListener in org.cojen.tupl

    Methods in org.cojen.tupl that return EventListener
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default EventListener EventListener.ignore​(System.Logger.Level... levels)
    Returns a filtered listener which never observes the given event levels.
    default EventListener EventListener.ignore​(EventType.Category... categories)
    Returns a filtered listener which never observes the given event categories.
    static EventListener EventListener.logTo​(System.Logger logger)
    Returns a new listener that logs messages to the given logger.
    static EventListener EventListener.logTo​(Logger logger)
    Returns a new listener that logs messages to the given logger.
    static EventListener EventListener.logTo​(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
    Returns a new listener that logs messages to the given logger.
    default EventListener EventListener.observe​(System.Logger.Level... levels)
    Returns a filtered listener which only observes the given event levels.
    default EventListener EventListener.observe​(EventType.Category... categories)
    Returns a filtered listener which only observes the given event categories.
    static EventListener EventListener.printTo​(PrintStream out)
    Returns a new listener that prints messages to the given stream.
    Methods in org.cojen.tupl with parameters of type EventListener
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.eventListener​(EventListener listener)
    Set a listener which receives notifications of actions being performed by the database.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.eventListeners​(EventListener... listeners)
    Set multiple listeners which receive notifications of actions being performed by the database.
